statements: SELECT designer_id, designer_name, design_sketches FROM fashion_designer_data;
SELECT designer_name, fabric_swatches FROM fashion_designer_data WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designer_data WHERE designer_name LIKE '%Dior%';
SELECT designer_id, inspiration_images FROM fashion_designer_data ORDER BY designer_id DESC;
SELECT designer_name, fabric_swatches FROM fashion_designer_data LIMIT 3 OFFSET 1;
SELECT * FROM fashion_designer_data WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, design_sketches FROM fashion_designer_data WHERE designer_id > 2 ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_designers FROM fashion_designer_data;
SELECT designer_name, design_sketches, inspiration_images FROM fashion_designer_data WHERE designer_id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT designer_id, designer_name, fabric_swatches FROM fashion_designer_data ORDER BY designer_name ASC, designer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM FashionDesignersDesigns;
SELECT designer_name, design_sketches, fabric_swatches FROM FashionDesignersDesigns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, designer_name, design_sketches, inspiration_images FROM FashionDesignersDesigns WHERE designer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, designer_name FROM FashionDesignersDesigns ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT note_id, note_title, note_content FROM DesignersNotes WHERE designer_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, design_sketches FROM FashionDesignersDesigns WHERE id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, inspiration_images FROM FashionDesignersDesigns WHERE designer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT designer_name, design_sketches, fabric_swatches FROM FashionDesignersDesigns ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM DesignersNotes WHERE designer_id = 2;
SELECT note_title, note_content FROM DesignersNotes WHERE note_title LIKE '%collection%' ORDER BY note_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM DesignSketches;
SELECT designer_name, sketch_image FROM DesignSketches WHERE designer_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM FabricSwatches ORDER BY fabric_type DESC;
SELECT designer_name, image_url FROM InspirationImages WHERE designer_name = 'Jane' ORDER BY image_id;
SELECT designer_name, fabric_type, swatch_image FROM FabricSwatches WHERE designer_name = 'Alice' AND fabric_type = 'Cotton';
SELECT * FROM DesignSketches WHERE designer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM FabricSwatches ORDER BY fabric_type DESC;
SELECT designer_name, image_url FROM InspirationImages WHERE designer_name = 'Jane Smith' ORDER BY image_id ASC;
SELECT MAX(sketch_id) AS max_sketch_id FROM DesignSketches;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sketches FROM DesignSketches GROUP BY designer_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM DesignSketches;
SELECT designer_name, sketch_description FROM DesignSketches WHERE sketch_id = 1;
SELECT designer_name, swatch_material FROM FabricSwatches ORDER BY swatch_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM InspirationImages WHERE designer_name = 'Alice' AND image_description LIKE '%inspiration%';
SELECT designer_name, designer_email FROM Designers WHERE designer_phone IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM DesignSketches;
SELECT designer_name, sketch_description FROM DesignSketches WHERE designer_name='Alice';
SELECT designer_name, sketch_description, sketch_image FROM DesignSketches WHERE sketch_id=1;
SELECT * FROM Designers ORDER BY designer_name DESC;
SELECT designer_name, designer_email FROM Designers WHERE designer_phone='1234567890';
SELECT * FROM designer_sketches;
SELECT designer_name, sketch_title, sketch_date FROM designer_sketches WHERE sketch_id = 1;
SELECT DISTINCT designer_name FROM designer_sketches ORDER BY designer_name ASC;
SELECT sketch_title, sketch_description FROM designer_sketches WHERE sketch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sketch_id, designer_name, sketch_title, sketch_date FROM designer_sketches WHERE designer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM designer_sketches;
SELECT designer_name, sketch_title, sketch_date FROM designer_sketches WHERE designer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT sketch_title, sketch_date FROM designer_sketches WHERE sketch_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM fabric_swatches WHERE swatch_material = 'Silk';
SELECT designer_name, image_title, image_url FROM inspiration_images ORDER BY image_id DESC;
